trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_SEQ_00<tab>The swarthy Resistance fighter is at wit's end.
TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_TODO_00<tab>Search for the swarthy Resistance fighter's ward.
TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the ward to the swarthy Resistance fighter.
TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_000<tab>Damn it all! Where could it have got to!?

TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_001<tab>Oh! Um, pardon me, fellow lover of freedom and justice. You haven't seen a ward of the Destroyer anywhere, have you? Maybe on the ground, as if a certain bloody fool had dropped it?
TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_002<tab>Aye, I'd been him. I had it this morning, that much I know for certain, and I've not left the Reach since, so it's got to be around here somewhere.

TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_003<tab>Hmm... If you've got a moment to spare, would you be willing to help me search? I spent some time near the Temple of the Fist earlier, so it might be there. As for me, I'll look around near the officer's pavilion.
TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_004<tab>They're hardly rare, I know, and I could just as easily buy another, but even so... Please, help me find it...
TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_005<tab>If it's not here, then it's got to be somewhere near the Temple of the Fist. At least, I think it's got to be one of these two locations...
TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_010<tab>I swear, I've searched high and low, but it just won't turn up...
TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_011<tab>Seven hells, that's the one! That's my lucky ward! You're a godssend, <var 08 E905 ((sister)) ((brother)) /var>!
TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_012<tab>Before I was born, my mother made a pilgrimage to the Temple of the Fist, where she, like many others, received the blessings of the monks.
TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_013<tab>And then Theodoric came and burned it all to the ground, the mad bastard. And after him came the Garleans, who cared even less for our beliefs.

TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_BURLYPRIVATE02638_000_014<tab>But I still keep to the old ways, as do many others. And when my son is born, I'll teach him the stories and the scripture, as my mother taught me...
TEXT_STMBDZ004_02638_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>Assisting one of your fellow freedom fighters? I will leave you to it, then.
